loans.name: Nuevo Horizonte Group

texts.es: El grupo lo integran mujeres esforzadas y exitosas, coordinado por la señora Adriana de 40 años de edad, casada y madre de cuatro hijos, de los cuales dos están a cargo de ella, tiene su taller de sastrería en su domicilio, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo debido a que él es sastre y fue quien la motivo a impulsar este negocio, con el crédito invertirá principalmente en tela, hilo, satín, entre telas, gabardinas, botones, zipper y mantenimiento de maquinarias, este grupo lleva 19 ciclos prestando en esta institución y esta socia ha logrado mejoras en su vida personal y laboral. Otra de las socias es la señora Candida de 47 años dedicada a la compra-venta de frutas por temporada como es el níspero, naranja, papaya y los comercializa en el mercado local.
texts.en:
This is a group of strong and successful women, led by Adriana. She is 40 years old, is married and has four children.  Two of the children are still under her care.  She runs a tailor shop in her home.  Her husband supports her in this; he is himself a tailor, and it was he who encouraged her to start this business.

She will invest the loan proceeds mainly in cloth, inner linings, thread, buttons, zippers and raincoats, and she will also perform maintenance on her machines.

This group is currently in its 19th loan cycle with this lending institution, and this member has managed to make improvements in her personal and working life.  

One of the other members, Candida, is 47 years old and has a business buying and selling seasonal fruit such as oranges, papaya, and medlar.  She sells these in local markets.

loans.use: to purchase cloth, inner linings, thread, buttons, zippers and raincoats, and to perform maintenance on her machines.

loans.name: Anabel

texts.es: Anabel tiene 32 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su pequeño hijo de 8 años de edad. Anabel es muy trabajadora, todos los días se levanta muy temprano para ocuparse de la tareas del hogar y luego dirigirse a su trabajo en una fábrica cercana a su localidad. Anabel solicita este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea instalar el servicio de agua potable y construir una pila para el almacenamiento del vital líquido. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena, ladrillo y pagará por la conexión al servicio del agua potable.
texts.en: Anabel is 32 years old and lives in her own house with her young son, who is eight years old. Anabel is very hard-working: every day she gets up very early in order to take care of the household chores; later she heads out to work at a factory near her town.  Anabel is applying for this loan from "FUSAI" as she wants to have running water in her home and to build a well to store this vital liquid. Anabel will use this loan to buy cement, sand and bricks and to pay to connect to running water services.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and bricks and to pay to connect to running water services.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: G/s La Sangre De Cristo Group

texts.es:
El g.s Sangre de Cristo está conformado por tres integrantes madres  responsables con  cuatro hijos bajo su responsabilidad. Son originarias de León, lugar que está ubicado en la zona de occidente del país, se caracterizan por ser trabajadoras, responsables, con ganas de superación personal. En sus ratos libre le gusta disfruta de la compañia de sus hijos. Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudieron cursar una carrera y se vieron obligados a trabajar desde temprana edad. En la actualidad luchan día  día para brindarles un futuro mejor a sus hijos.
Gracias  a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante la cordinadora es  Teodora y tiene por actividad económica la venta de mercadería en general como pantalones, camisas, faldas, short, sandalias, ropa de interior, toallas. Ella dedica a su negocio unas diez horas diarias ofreciendo su producto. El negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación y de forma ambulante. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo  y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de mercadería para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. El g.s Sangre de Cristo agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan  a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
The solidarity group “Sangre de Cristo” (Blood of Christ) consists of three members who are responsible mothers and take care of four children among them. They are originally from León, a place that is located in the western part of the country. The members are known for being hardworking, responsible, and having the drive to succeed on a personal level. In their free time, they enjoy being with their children. Unfortunately, due to the lack of financial resources, they were not able to study for a degree since they were obligated to work at an early age. At the moment, they strive each day to provide a better future for their children.

Thanks to her efforts and her desire to move forward, the group leader, Teodora, has a business of selling general merchandise such as trousers, shirts, skirts, shorts, sandals, undergarments, and towels. She works at her business approximately 10 hours a day by offering her products. Her business is located in her home, but she also sells as a traveling vendor. The purpose of her loan is to invest it as operating capital so that she can restock her business of buying and selling merchandise. In the near future, she hopes to generate more income.

The solidarity group “Sangre de Cristo” is grateful for the assistance that Kiva lenders provide to people who have limited resources and come from poor countries, such as Nicaragua, so that they have a means of earning a decent living.

loans.use: to buy trousers, shirts, skirts, shorts, sandals, undergarments, and towels.

loans.name: Kuña Pora Group

texts.es:
El grupo se llama Kuña Pora está en su 5º ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas se comprometieron a trabajar y a ayudarse entre todas para salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 2 de las 21 señoras se encuentra en l indicador dos de ingresos estables. Trabajan unidas para salir adelante, tener su propio negocio e incrementar su venta.
Rosa es una de ellas, quien se dedica a vender joyas de variadas clases, ella es una mujer muy trabajadora que está luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida por medio de su trabajo. Su sueño es poder tener una joyería y así poder seguir luchando por mejorar su vida y ayudando a su familia.
Rosa pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de joyas variadas para la venta, lo que le permitirá seguir creciendo y luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Ella es una persona con ansias de poder crecer y ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
The group of women known as Kuña Pora are currently in their fifth loan cycle.  They all promise to work and to help each other to get ahead.  They are working to eliminate poverty. Only two of the twenty-one women in the group have stable income.  They work together in order to run their own businesses and increase their sales.

One member is Rosa, who sells different types of jewelry.  She is a hardworking woman who is fighting to raise her standard of living through her work.  Her dream is to have her own jewelry shop and this be able to keep fighting to improve her live and help her family.

She is seeking this loan in order to purchase a variety of jewelry for sale. This will permit her to keep growing and to continue working to improve her quality of life.  She is highly motivated to grow and help her family.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of jewelry for sale.

loans.name: Milagro De La Paz

texts.es:
Milagro es una persona de 46 años de edad, es una persona con excelentes referencias personales, muy conocida en su comunidad por la actividad que realiza,  es madre de dos hijos. La señora Milagro se creció con sus padres quienes se dedicaban a la agricultura y ganadería con el paso del tiempo la señora consiguió trabajo en un comedor del pueblo en el que se dedicaba a la elaboración de pupusas y fue allí donde adquirió conocimiento y experiencia. Luego de un buen tiempo decidió independizarse y adquirió un crédito para comprar una plancha para hacer pupusas y comenzó su negocio los fines de semana, fue adquiriendo clientes y ahora se dedica a la pupuseria todos los días de la semana  a esta actividad se suma su hija la menor.


Milagro se dedica al comercio, en la venta de pupusas todos los días de la semana, en un horario de las 3 de la tarde a 8 de la noche y esta actividad es llevada a cabo con la ayuda de su hija y realizando esta actividad tiene una experiencia de 10 años, actividad que aprendió cuando estuvo prestando sus servicios en un comedor del su municipio donde ella puso empeño y fue muy atenta y mostro mucha disposición en aprender todo lo que se le enseñaba.


El dinero será invertido en comprar una plancha más grande para hacer pupusas, pues la que tiene es muy pequeña y día con día la demanda de pupusas de parte de sus antiguos y clientes nuevos es cada día mayor y esto le hace presión a que adquiera un equipo mejor para realizar la actividad con más agilidad, de esta manera tendrá mejores ganancias las que serán invertidas en mejoramiento de vivienda, de esta forma mejorara su calidad de vida y tendrán una vivienda con mejores condiciones.

Las proyecciones que ella tiene a futuro son las de construir un local más grande donde pueda desarrollarse mejor con la pupuseria y montar un comedor de esta manera dará un mejor servicio a sus clientes ya que hay una mayoría que le exigen un menú deferente y con respecto a sus hijos anhela que salgan adelante ante cualquier obstáculo de la vida pretende apoyarlos con todas sus fuerzas hasta donde pueda.
texts.en:
Milagro, who is 46 years old, has excellent personal references and is well known in her community for the work she does. She has two children. Milagro grew up with her parents who worked in agriculture and livestock. Eventually she found work in an eatery in the town where she made pupusas [thick corn tortillas stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans]. This is where she gained her knowledge and experience. 

After a good while she decided to set up independently and took out a loan to buy a griddle for making pupusas. She started her business at the weekends and started building up customers. Now she works in her pupusa stall every day and her younger daughter helps out. Milagro works in the business selling pupusas every day of the week, from 3 in the afternoon until 8 at night. She does her work with the help of her daughter and she has 10 years' experience in the business. She learnt the skills when she was working in an eatery in the town where she worked hard and was very attentive and showed a willingness to learn everything she was being taught. 

The money will be used to buy a larger griddle for making pupusas, because the one she has is very small and the demand from her old and new customers is growing every day. This has put her under pressure to to buy better equipment so she can do the work more easily. This will give her better profits which will be used to improve her home. By doing this she will improve her quality of life and they will have better living conditions.

Her plans for the future are to build bigger premises where she can develop the pupusa business better and set up a dining room so she can give her customers a better service, since a lot of them are asking her to change her menu. As for her children, she really hopes they will get on and overcome any obstacles in life and intends to fully support them as much as she can.

loans.use: to buy a larger grill for making pupusas.

loans.name: Wamplan Group

texts.es:
Narda: Es coordinadora del Grupo Solidario Wamplan, el cual está integrado por tres mujeres, que se organizaron con el propósito  de buscar alternativas de financiamiento mediante crédito con Pana Pana, para poder mejorar sus negocios e ingresos, que les permitan mejorar las condiciones de vida de sus familias, para poder cubrir necesidades básicas de alimentación, educación y vivienda.

Narda es una jovial mujer, tiene 26 años de edad, es casada y tiene 3 hijos, de los cuales 2 son menores de edad que asisten al colegio y un pequeño de 6 meses. Con el objetivo de contar con su propia fuente de ingresos, desde hace 2 años estableció su negocio de venta de bastimentos en el mercado municipal de Waspam, instalándose a la orilla de la calle, ofertando banano, yuca, quequisque, plátano que expone en el piso utilizando bolsas de plástico negro como mantel. No posee tramo o mesa donde exponer su mercadería. Solicita su primer financiamiento para incrementar su inventario de productos para poder vender más y mejorar sus ingresos. Su sueño es construir su vivienda de concreto y que su negocio crezca. 

Rosaura: Desde hace aproximadamente 4 años vende bastimentos en el mercado municipal de Waspam, a orillas de la calle, ofertando sus productos en el suelo porque  no posee tramo o mesa donde exponer su mercadería. Solicita su primer financiamiento para comprar: Yuca, quequisque, malanga, coco, malanga, plátano, pilipitas, chiltoma y cebolla. Su sueño es que su negocio crezca. 

Merosalinda: También es integrante del grupo Wanplan. Desde hace 3 años inició con un pequeño capital propio la venta de pescado en el mercado Municipal de Waspam, se ubica  a la orilla de la calle con su termo para ofertar sus productos. Solicita su primer financiamiento para incrementar su inventario de productos para poder vender más y mejorar sus ingresos, comprar pescados y mariscos en la comunidad de Bismona y venderlos a precios accesibles. Su sueño es construir su vivienda de concreto y que su negocio crezca.
texts.en:
Narda is the coordinator for the solidarity group named “Wanplan”, which consists of three women. They decided to organize as a group so that they could look for financing alternatives, such as securing a loan from Pana Pana. This would enable them to improve their businesses and their incomes. As a result, they can improve the living conditions of their families and provide for their basic needs such as food, education, and shelter.

Narda, age 26, is a jovial woman who is married and has three children. Two of them are in school and the youngest is only six months old. In order to have an income of her own, Narda established her business two years ago at the municipal market in Waspam where she sells provisions. Her business is set up on the edge of the street and there she offers bananas, cassava, “quequisque” (a tuber similar to taro root), and plantains on top of black plastic bags that are laid out on the ground like a tablecloth. She does not have a cart or a table on which she can place her merchandise. Narda is requesting her first loan so that she can increase her inventory of products, which would allow her to sell more and improve her earnings. Her dream is to build a concrete house and see her business grow.

Rosaura has also been selling provisions at the municipal market in Waspam for approximately four years. Her business is on the edge of the street as well. Her products are laid out on the ground because she does not have a cart or a table on which to place her merchandise. She is requesting her first loan in order to buy cassava, “quequisque”, malanga root, coconuts, plantains, “pilipitas” (a type of banana), bell peppers, and onions. Her dream is to grow her business.

Merosalinda is also a member of the group “Wanplan”. Three years ago and with a small amount of her own capital, she started a business of selling fish at the municipal market in Waspam. She offers her products by standing on the edge of the street with her cooler. Merosalinda is requesting her first loan in order to increase her inventory of products so that she can sell more and increase her earnings. She will buy fish and shrimp in the community of Bismona and then sell them at affordable prices. Her dream is to build a concrete house and to grow her business.

loans.use: to increase her inventory at her cassava, plantains, and "quequisque" (similar to taro root) business

loans.name: Clarisa Antonia

texts.es: Es una mujer jovial, trabajadora, originaria de Puerto Cabezas, tiene 30 años de edad, está casada, hace 11 meses procreo a su primer hijo.  Con el objetivo de contar con su propia vivienda y vivir de manera segura, solicita su segundo financiamiento para construir su vivienda de madera de 30 x 30 pies y su cocina de 12 x 14 pies de madera, en el terreno que compró en conjunto con su esposo con sus ahorros y aguinaldo de diciembre del año 2013. Desde hace 10 años habita en una pequeña casa de tambo de madera de su mama, la cual es compartida por aproximadamente 6 familiares, solamente disponen de 2 cuartos. Su sueño es contar con una vivienda de concreto con las condiciones básicas, construir la división de los cuartos, baño, muro perimetral y porche.
texts.en:
She's a cheerful and hardworking 30-year-old woman from Puerto Cabezas.  She's married and had her first child 11 months ago.

Her goal is to have her own house and live safely, so she's requesting her second loan to build her 30 x 30-foot house of wood and her 12 x 14-foot kitchen on the land she and her husband bought with savings and a bonus from December 2013.

For 10 years she has been living in just two rooms in her mother's small house, which is shared by approximately six family members.  Her dream is to have her own concrete house with the basic amenities and room divisions, a bathroom, a perimeter wall, and a porch.

loans.use: to build her wood house and an annex for the kitchen

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es: José tiene 45 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 12 años y 9 años de edad, su madre y una hermana. José no contó con la oportunidad de estudiar una carrera universitaria por lo que se dedico a la prestación de servicios de seguridad lo cual le ha permitido llevar el sustento a su hogar y mantener la economía de su familia. Actualmente, no cuenta con el servicio de energía eléctrica y ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación del servicio de energía eléctrica que tanta falta le hace.
texts.en: José is 45 years old. He lives in his own home with his two sons, ages 12 and 9 years, his mother, and one sister. José never had the opportunity to go to college, but instead went into the business of providing security services. This work has let him earn a living and sustain his household and his family. He currently doesn't have electrical service in his home, and he has decided to request a loan from FUSAI which he will invest in installing electricity, which he lacks.

loans.use: install electricity in his home.

loans.name: Juaneras Group

texts.en:
San Juan La Laguna is a lovely little town on the shores of the majestic Lake Atitlan in Guatemala. A new Friendship Bridge Trust Bank was formed here that is called “Juaneras,” meaning “Women of San Juan.” The group is composed of seven women who are mostly weavers. They also work with natural dyes, and their products are very lovely.

Julia is a younger member of the group. She is 23 years of age, single and eager to excel. Like most of the women of San Juan La Laguna, Julia learned to weave when she was a child. She currently owns a textile shop along with her mother. Julia is requesting a new loan in order to sustain and grow her business. She plans to purchase yarn and then using natural dyes, transform it into beautiful colors. She will then weave it into beautiful fabrics that will become scarves, shawls and table runners. Julia is very pleased to participate in this business because it allowed her to finish high school and enter college. She is studying business administration. Julia sets a wonderful example for the other women in her Trust Bank.

During the monthly meetings, the women not only make payments on their loans but also receive educational training from a Friendship Bridge Loan Officer. For many of the women, it is the first time that they are learning in an educational setting, as they began working as children and did not have the opportunity to attend school. The ladies learn about business administration, marketing and budgeting as well as women’s health and leadership, self-esteem and empowerment.

Kiva investors are greatly appreciated by Friendship Bridge clients like Julia. Armed with small loans and educational training that Friendship Bridge calls “microcredit plus,” the women can step more confidently and empowered into a more successful future. Their families and their community will realize benefits as well. Thank you, Kiva investors!

loans.use: to buy yarn for natural dyes and to make products

loans.name: Veronica De Jesus

texts.es: La señora verónica es madre soltera de dos hijos, ella tiene 14 años trabajando con el negocio de reciclaje de la basura, labor que empezó recogiendo chatarras en las calles de Managua en conjunto con sus hijos quienes trabajan y estudian, hoy en día ella vende por mayor a las empresas, gracias a sus ahorros ha podido construir su humilde vivienda. Solicita este primer crédito para invertirlos en plásticos, cartones, papeles, alambres electrodomésticos entre otros, de esta manera mantener su negocio y los gastos del hogar.
texts.en: Veronica is the single mother of two children.  She’s been working in the recycling business for 14 years.  She began by collecting discards on the streets of Managua with her children who work and attend school.  Now she sells to large companies and thanks to her savings she was able to build a humble home.  She is asking for her first loan to buy plastics, cardboard, papers, wires, appliances, and other things to maintain her business and pay the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy recyclables.

loans.name: Marilina

texts.es: Marilina tiene 49 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo quien es albañil y junto  a su pequeño hijo de 4 años quien ya comenzó con su educación escolar. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora quien se dedica  a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace mucho tiempo. Ella desea reparar el techo de la vivienda el cual se encuentra deteriorado y además desea repara una pila que tiene quebrada. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de madera, polines, ladrillo, cemento y arena para poder preceder a los arreglos necesarios.
texts.en:
Marilina is 49 years old and lives in her own home with her husband, who is a bricklayer, and their young son who is 4 years old and has already started school.

She is a very hardworking woman and has been a domestic worker for many years. She wants to repair her roof, which has deteriorated, as well as a supporting beam which has been damaged by fire.  She is seeking this loan through FUSAI in order to purchase wood, beams, bricks, cement and sand so that she can proceed with the necessary repairs.

loans.use: to purchase wood, beams, bricks, cement and sand in order to repair her roof and a supporting column.

loans.name: José Ángel

texts.es:
José logró estudiar hasta noveno grado, por razones económicas sus padres no le dieron continuidad a su carrera, él está acompañado y sus hijos se encuentran estudiando.

Jose tiene una pequeña tienda en la escuela de la comunidad, dado que no hay otra tienda dentro del centro educativo, el negocio surgió cuando su hijo quien todavía esta yendo a la escuela llegaba a la casa después de clases comentándole a su padre que no había comido nada por que no había nada que comprar, fue entonces cuando decidió hacer la propuesta a la directora de la escuela de poner una tienda.

El necesita este crédito porque hay muchas necesidades en su tienda, las cuales no alcanza a cubrir  al instante por esta, razón quiere el crédito y lo invertirá en comprar productos que no tiene en su tienda  y también poder comprar algunas vitrinas que un amigo le esta vendiendo a buen precio y en buen estado 

El sueño de Jose es que su negocio pueda mejorar y tener todo lo necesario para que todos los alumnos puedan cubrir sus necesidades, tambien que sus dos hijos puedan llegar a ser unos profesionales y sabe que lo puede llegar a lograr con la ayuda del crédito ya que asi su tienda estará mas surtida.
texts.en:
José completed his education through the ninth grade.  For economic reasons his parents were not able to help him continue to pursue a higher educational level.  He has a life partner and his children are in school.

José has a small store in the community school.  There is no other store within the educational center, and the business began when his son, who still goes to that same school, came home after classes commenting to his dad that he had not eaten anything because there was nothing to buy.  That was when José decided to make a proposal to the school director to open up a store.

He needs a loan because there are many needs for his store, and he cannot meet those needs immediately.  For this reason he wants credit and he will invest it in the purchase of products that he doesn't have for his store and also to buy some windows that a friend is selling at a good price and in good condition. 

José's dream is that his business would grow and he would have everything necessary so that the students would be able to meet their needs.  Also he hopes that his two children will be able to be professionals.  He knows what he can achieve through the help of a loan and knows that it will help supply his store.

loans.use: To purchase products that he doesn't have for his store and also to buy some windows that a friend is selling at a good price and in good condition.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita, 58, is a hardworking woman who is married and has six children. For the past sixteen years she has bought and sold charcoal in the Philippines. She also earns an income from raising pigs.

Carmelita has borrowed and paid off nineteen loans from NWTF before this one. She is applying for a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell. She is working to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Neftaly

texts.es: Neftaly, tiene 29 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa con quien tiene dos hijos, reside con su familia en una aldea del municipio de Gracias, Lempira. siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura, cultivando maíz y frijol. Y hace 6 años comenzó también con el cultivo de café, el cual vende en la misma zona. Con el propósito de mejorar su finca y obtener mejores cosechas ha solicitado un préstamo por 20,000 lempiras para poder fertilizar la finca y cubrir gastos de  mano de obra. Su plan es crecer como agricultor para darles buena educación a sus hijos y también vivienda.
texts.en: Neftaly is 29 years old, lives in a common law marriage with his wife with whom he has two children.  He lives in a small town in the municipality of Gracias, Lempira.  He has always worked in agriculture cultivating corn and beans.  He started cultivating coffee six years ago, which he sells in the same area.  With the purpose of improving his farm and obtain better crops he is requesting a loan of 20,000 lempiras to fertilize his farm and cover labor expenses.  His plan is to keep growing as a farmer to give his sons a good education and a home.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and pay for labor in his coffee farm.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan es un cliente de Kubo Financiero y esta es su historia.
Juan tiene 45 años y vive con su esposa Beatriz y dos hijos de 19 y 11 años. El dice que le gusta el rock en ingles, el fútbol americano y también le gusta bailar. El se considera muy trabajador y siempre da el 100%. Juan tiene un a panadería desde hace 15 años, el produce pan blanco, pan dulce, pasteles, bocadillos y pan de temporada. Es un negocio familiar que lo atiende junto con su esposa (que aparece con el en la foto). Sus principales logros han sido crecer y mejorar su panadería y sacar adelante a sus hijos. Juan quiere seguir creciendo su negocio y esta solicitando el préstamo para comprar un horno y materias primas para su panadería.
texts.en:
Juan is a client of Kuba Financiero and this is his story.

Juan is 45 years old and lives with his wife Beatriz and two children who are 19 and 11 years old. He says that he likes English rock, American football and also dancing. He considers himself to be very hardworking and always gives 100%. Juan has had a bakery since he was 15 years old, and he produces white bread, sweet bread, pastries, sandwiches and seasonal breads. It is a family business which he runs together with his wife (who appears with him in the photo). Their principal successes have been to grow and improve their bakery and help their children get ahead. Juan wants to continue growing his business and is seeking a loan to buy an oven and primary materials for his bakery.

loans.use: to buy merchandise and an oven for his bakery

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a variety of garments for women and men.

loans.name: Dúo Sinceridad Group

texts.es:
DUO SINCERIDAD
Doña Hilda Verónica es originaria de la aldea Xetzac Tecpán, ella tiene 28 años de edad, ella se dedica a la crianza de animales y a la elaboración de tejidos típicos a mano.
Desde hace algunos años ella ha venido  realizando estas actividades, y gracias a Dios poco a poco su negocio ha ido creciendo.
Con el crédito que ella recibió lo invirtió en compra de animales y concentrado y también en compra de materia prima para tejidos.
Ella sueña con ampliar mas su negocio, para tener mejores ganancias y asi mejorar su calidad de vida,esta solicitando este credito para la compra de animales para la crianza.
texts.en:
Duo Sinceridad

Hilda Verónica is from the village of Xetzac Tecpán. She is 28 years old and she works raising animals and making traditional handmade textiles.

She has been doing these things for several years, and thanks be to God, little by little her business has been growing.

With the loan that she received, she invested in buying animals and feed concentrate, as well as raw materials to make textiles.

She dreams of growing her business even more, to make better profits and so to imporve her quality of life. She is requesting this loan to buy animals to raise.

loans.use: to buy animals to raise

loans.name: Elba

texts.es:
Doña Elba es una mujer de 42 años de edad, se dedica a criar cerdos para engorde, también tiene pollos y siembra hortalizas, aunque el fuerte son los cerdos. Muestra ser una mujer trabajadora y con deseos de continuar en su actividad productiva. Logra incrementar sus activos fijos gracias a los préstamos que ha recibido en Fundación Mujer. Ella desea este crédito para construir un tanque que funciona como recolector de aguas residuales de la porqueriza.
Tomando como referencia el lugar donde habita Elba, esta es una actividad que se ajusta a esta realidad, ya que cuentan con el terreno para criar los animales, así mismo las personas que demandan cerdos se trasladan estas zonas para realizar la compra de los mismos, teniendo la posibilidad de vender lechones o esperar y venderlos a un mayor precio si hay una sobre oferta de los cerdos. Desea continuar con su actividad productiva ya que genera ingresos al hogar y le permite aportar a los estudios de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Elba, 42, raises pigs and chickens and grows vegetables, although her primary business is raising pigs.  She shows herself as a hard-working woman with a desire to continue in her business activity.  She has been able to increase her fixed assets thanks to the loans received through the Women's Foundation.  The loan she wants now is to build a sewage collection tank for her pig pen.

Taking into account where Elba lives, this is a business that fits the location since she has the land to raise the animals.  The customers visit her for the purchasing transactions and she either sells them suckling pigs or waits to sell at a better price when the demand is higher.  She is interested in continuing her production since it is a way to earn an income and give her children an education.

loans.use: to build a sewage collection tank for her pig pen

loans.name: Edgard Antonio

texts.es: Don Edgar nació en un municipio cercano a Peñas Blancas, estudio solo primero y segundo grado de primaria, para luego dedicarse a trabajar con su papa en actividades de campo, el esta sembrando café, estuvo casado pero al corto tiempo decidieron separarse y no tiene hijos, actualmente se encuentra trabajando con su padre en la agricultura y poco a poco a puesto una pequeña pulpería en su casa, en la comunidad  no tienen luz eléctrica y la única forma de iluminarse  por las noches es con candiles o candelas  el desea adquirir un préstamo para poder comprar su panel solar e instalarlo en su casa   esto ayudara a sus padres a tener una mejor condición de vida además que podría atender a los clientes en la noche  en su pulperia
texts.en:
Edgar was born in a municipality close to Peñas Blancas.  He only stayed in school through second grade, and then went to work with his father in the fields.  He was married for a short time, but he and his wife decided to separate.  He does not have children.

Currently, he raises coffee crops alongside his father, and little by little he is building a small grocery store in his home.  There is no electricity available where he lives, and the only means of providing light at night is using candles or oil lamps.

He is seeking a loan so that he can purchase a solar panel and install it in his home.  This will help his parents to have a better quality of life.  It will also allow him to attend to customers in the evenings in his grocery store.

loans.use: to purchase a solar power system.

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
Graciela es una señora casada de 50 años de edad, actualmente vive junto a sus cuatro hijos de los cuales son: tres hombres y una mujer ambos mayores de edad, quienes viven en el Departamento de Suchitepequez.
Graciela comenta que se dedica a dos actividades las cuales son: la venta de abarrotes y la crianza de marranos. Estas dos actividades la han ayudado a contribuir a la economía de su familia. Por lo que ahora lleva veinticinco años de laborar en estos dos oficios que bondadosamente su padre le enseño, hasta la fecha aun siguen siendo productivos en cuanto a la generación de ingresos y ganancias.
Ahora ha observado que estos negocios son bastante rentables, por lo que está solicitando un préstamo de Q 10,000.00 para la compra de materiales de construcción ya que necesita mejorar la estructura de su vivienda. El préstamo lo pagara con los negocios que tiene actualmente. 
Ella es una mujer soñadora y uno de sus sueños es asegurarle una vivienda digna a su familia, para que en un futuro puedan vivir en condiciones optimas.
texts.en:
Graciela is a married lady, age 50.  She has four grown children, three men and one woman, with whom she lives in the Department of Suchitepéquez.
 
Graciela explains that she has two occupations, which are selling groceries and raising pigs. These two occupations have helped her to contribute to her family’s finances. She has been engaged in these two occupations—taught to her by her father with great kindness and thoughtfulness—for 25 years now, and to date, they continue to be productive with respect to the generation of income and earnings. 
 
She has noticed that these businesses are fairly profitable, so she is seeking a loan of 10,000 Quetzals for the purchase of construction materials to improve her house. She will repay the loan by means of her businesses. 

She is a woman who has dreams, and one of these is to ensure a decent home for her family, so that in the future they will have good living conditions.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to improve her house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more material in bulk.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco, es una persona de 32 años de edad, vive con su hijo en el municipio de Nahualá, departamento de Sololá, su hijo tiene 4 años de edad todavía no asiste a la escuela, él se dedica a la producción de almácigos de café y a la siembra de frijol, tiene 10 años de dedicarse a esta actividad, y le es bastante rentable, Francisco necesita un crédito por un monto de Q. 3,000.00 para invertir en la producción y venta de almácigos de café, el sueño de Francisco es apoyar a su hijo para que estudie y se prepare bien académicamente ya que la esposa falleció.
texts.en:
Francisco is a 32-year-old person who lives with his son in the municipality of Nahualá, in the department of Sololá. His son is four years old and is not yet attending school. 

Francisco earns his living producing coffee seedlings and growing beans. He has been working in this business for ten years, and it is fairly profitable. Francisco needs a loan for the sum of 3,000 Guatemalan Quetzals (GTQ) to invest in the production and sale of coffee seedlings. 

Francisco's dream is to support his son so that he can go to school and get a good education, as his wife has already passed away.

loans.use: to invest in the production and sale of coffee seedlings

loans.name: Fortuna

texts.es:
Fortuna continua dedicándose a la agricultura entonces cosecha hojas de coca y yuca. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de Huanca de Patria” y esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas y así aumentar su capital de trabajo en este rubro.

Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Fortuna continues to make a living in agriculture, harvesting coca leaves and yucca. She has been in this business for a number of years, and it is going very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work. She belongs to the “Señor de Huanca de Patria” community banks, and on this occasion, she requires a loan to buy seeds so that she can increase her working capital in this area.

She is grateful for and values the loan, and is committed to making her monthly loan repayments responsibly.

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Samson

texts.en:
From Embu, Samson, a 32-year-old married father of two who is a mixed-crop farmer. He is married to Ann, who also works on the land. He earns a monthly income of approximately 15,000 KES, which he uses to support his family.

This marks Samson’s first loan term with Visionfund Kenya. With the 20,000 KES loan he has applied for he will be able to buy farming supplies such as seedlings and fertilizer.

Additional income created will allow Samson to improve the standard of living for his family and pay for his children’s school fees. In the future he would like to buy more acreage and so be a success.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies such as seedlings and fertilizer.

loans.name: Romeo

texts.en:
Romeo is a Cameroonian aged thirty who is married with two children. The older child is two years old and the younger, five months.

For over a year Romeo has gained experience offering secretarial and documentation services. His business is likely to succeed because it is located in an urban area with many potential customers. This 150,000 XAF loan through ACEP Cameroun will increase his capital by forty percent and allow him to buy a computer.

loans.use: to buy a computer for his office.

loans.name: Elias

texts.es:
Elías tiene 40 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el Caserío El Frayle, una zona rural del distrito de Santo Tomás, una comunidad con clima variado y abundante vegetación, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la ganadería cría y comercialización de ganado vacuno, posee trece reses de su propiedad, tiene sembrado tres Has de inverna donde cría su ganado vacuno desde hace 20 años, también se dedica al cultivo de maíz, tiene una familia unida que se esfuerza en la labor que realiza, ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de toretes para engorde para posteriormente ofrecerlos a un mejor precio.
texts.en:
Elias Jilmer, age 40, lives with his wife and children in the village of El Frayle.  It is a rural zone in the Santo Tomas district.  The community has a varied climate and abundant vegetation.  The population works in agriculture, commerce, and with livestock.  It is in the Cutervo Province in the Región Cajamarca in the northern highlands of Peru.

He is engaged in farming and marketing of cattle ranching, has thirteen cattle property, has planted three hectares of his greenhouse where he raises cattle for 20 years, and is also dedicated to the cultivation of corn. He has a close family that works hard. He has requested a loan of 3000 soles to purchase bulls for fattening and then offer them at a better price.

loans.use: to buy bulls for fattening

loans.name: Luz Shirley

texts.es:
La señora luz shirley estudiante de AUXILIAR EN SERVICIOS FARMACÉUTICOS de tercer semestre, ella es una mujer que desde muy joven tuvo que salir de la casa por conflictos familiares que había dentro del hogar, ella ha tenido que trabajar de sol a sol para poder sostenerse con la pareja.
Ella tiene muchas metas y sueños por cumplir y una de ellas es poder terminar la carrera de servicios farmacéuticos pero por la poca capacidad de pago le ha sido muy difícil continuar, y más en estos momentos ya que tiene una nueva responsabilidad, ya que espera el primer hijo, ella quiere y anhela terminar los estudios para así poderle brindar un buen bienestar al pequeño hijo.
Le agradece la colaboración a kiva con esta estudiante y la ayuda de pago que le puedan brindar con el convenio, ya que ella es una persona que como menciono antes no cuenta con el suficiente dinero, ya que esta esperando el primer bebe y los gastos se incrementan un poco.
texts.en:
Señora Luz Shirley is third-semester student in the Pharmaceutical Services Assistant program. She is a woman who had to leave home very young because of family conflicts within her household. She and her spouse have had to work from sun-up to sundown  to be able to support themselves. 

She has many goals and dreams to fulfill. One of them is to be able to finish the Pharmaceutical Services program of study, but because of her limited ability to pay, it has been difficult for her to continue, now more than ever since she has a new responsibility: she is expecting her first child. She wants and yearns to finish her education so that she can provide her little child with a good quality of life. 

CampoAlto appreciates your support of this student and the payment help that can be provided through the agreement with Kiva; she is a person who, as was mentioned before, does not have enough money because she is expecting her first baby and her expenses have increased a bit.

loans.use: to pay one semester's tuition.

loans.name: Los Ayllus De San Jeronimo Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LOS AYLLUS DE SAN JERONIMO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de San Jerónimo, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Juana Bertha ella es viuda y tiene 65 años y tiene 6 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de agricultura, la socia tiene un terreno donde cultiva papa,maíz,habas entre otros productos, la socia estos productos lo vende en los diferentes mercados, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el terreno de cultivo. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes para su terreno de cultivo.

El socio que esta pegado a la foto grupal se le tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidio permiso por motivos de trabajo.
 
 
 
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de agricultura, negocio de cabinas de internet, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These are the members of the communal bank "LOS AYLLUS DE SAN JERONIMO."  They live in the San Jeronimo district, which is part of the province and department of Cusco.

Bertha is one of the members.  She is a 65 year-old widow who has 6 children.  She works in agriculture on some land that she owns, cultivating potatoes, corn, and other products.  Bertha sells these products in various markets.  She works from 8am until 5pm, and she has 7 years of experience with this business, which is going very well.  Bertha dreams of having her own shop where she could sell corn, potatoes, and beans.  She is requesting a loan to buy seeds and fertilizers.

The member whose photo is attached to the group photo had his picture taken after the meeting because he had asked permission to miss the meeting because reasons related to his work.

The other members of this group work in agriculture, an internet cafe, a grocery store, and a restaurant. 

Bertha thanks those who are making it possible for her to pursue her dream, and she promises to make the payments on her loan according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds

loans.name: Isidora

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “HUAYOPATA-CHONTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huayopata, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Isidora trabaja en su negocio de venta de comida, la socia prepara diferentes platos como pollo con papas, sopas y saltados de carnes, la socia trabaja desde las 10:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como pollo, carne y verduras.


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member belongs to the communal bank "HUAYOPATA-CHONTA”. The bank is located in the district of Huayopata, belonging to the province of La Convencion and department of Cusco.  Isidora works in her business of selling food. The member prepares different dishes such as chicken with potatoes, soups and stir fried meats. The member works from 10:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m. The member has worked already many years in this business and is doing well. Her dream is to own a restaurant. The member requests a loan to buy cooking ingredients such as chicken, meat and vegetables. The member is happy for the loan and promises to make her loan payments.

loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients such as chicken, meat and vegetables.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
Alejandro vive en la ciudad de Huayopata que está ubicado en la provincia de La Convención del departamento del Cusco, él desde muy joven se dedico a la construcción pero ahora trabaja en una entidad del estado, él es una persona responsable y amable que pertenece al banco comunal "Buena Vista" de la Asociación Arariwa desde hace varios años y en sus horas libres se dedica a la construcción. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como por ejemplo cemento y arena. Alejandro agrace a los inversionistas por el préstamo y se compromete a pagar las cuotas con mucha responsabilidad. 

(Huayopata es un Distrito Tealero, tiene un Centro Poblado San Pablo, su población aproximada es de 12 mil habitantes.)
texts.en:
Alejandro lives in the city of Huayopata, which is located in the La Convencion province in the department of Cusco.  He has worked in construction since he was very young, and now works for a state organization.  He is a responsible and friendly person who has belonged to the Buena Vista community bank for many years.  In his free time, he works in construction.

He is requesting this loan to purchase materials, including cement and sand.  Alejandro is grateful to the lenders for the loan and promises to make his payments very responsibly.

loans.use: to purchase materials, including cement and sand.

loans.name: Ronilo

texts.en:
Ronilo is 53 years old and from Talibon, Bohol. For over ten years he has raised and sold pigs to make money.

Ronilo is asking for a 5,000 PHP loan through CEVI to buy pig feed and additional piglets to raise. With a loan, Ronilo will be able to raise healthy pigs that he can sell for a good price.

In the future, Ronilo hopes to expand his business and ensure it is a sustainable source of income.

loans.use: to buy pig feed and additional piglets to raise.

loans.name: Angye Alexandra

texts.es:
ANGYE, humilde mujer de 21 años de edad, junto a su esposo, atienden una peluquería y gabinete de belleza, ellos aprendieron el arte de cortes de cabello, alisados, colocación de extensiones de cabello en la calle con los amigos. Hoy alquilan un local en el centro de la ciudad y prestan este servicio.
Angye, con este préstamo comprara una cortadora de cabello, atomizadores, cabello sintético, pintura para cabello, peines y otros accesorios.
Con esta compra, también generara empleo a 2 personas para atender mejor en el local ya que hay mucha gente que los prefiere.
Angye y su esposo se encuentran en un tratamiento  para poder tener hijos. Y desde ya agradecen a quienes apoyan estos procesos que generan cambios.
texts.en:
Angye, an unassuming woman, age 21, operates a hair and beauty salon with her husband. They learned the art of hair cutting, straightening, and applying hair extensions in the neighborhood with their friends; and now they are renting a shop in the city center, where they provide these services.

With this loan, Angye will purchase a hair clipper, spray bottles, synthetic hair, hair color, combs, and other accessories. With this purchase, she would also be generating employment for two people, in order to improve service in the shop, as they are preferred by many people.

Angye and her husband are undergoing a treatment so that they will be able to have children. And they thank those who support these processes that create changes.

loans.use: to purchase a hair clipper, spray bottles, hair color, combs, and other accessories.

loans.name: Yuly Paola

texts.es:
Ella se llama yuly paola, tiene 22 años, actualmente vive en bogota. vive con la tía Deisy que es  mama  con los seis hermanos, en total son siete, la tía siempre ha sido madre cabeza de hogar yuly paola siempre se ha esmerado por hacer alguien en la vida, la tía le pudo dar el estudio hasta la primaria, desde hay ella misma se costio el estudio, lo termino validando, hasta que termino los estudios ha tenido muchos problemas por que tubo una niña pero el papa se la arrebato con engaños y mentiras, hubo un proceso que según el tenia desde hace un año y injustamente le dieron la custodia a el papa, a ella le dio muy duro hasta que tomo la desicion de seguir adelante con los estudios.     
Le a tocado muy duro porque lleva un proceso en otra ciudad para que le devuelvan a la hija laura valentina que se la quitaron injustamente, desde que entro a estudiar al instituto campo alto le a cambiado la vida totalmente, porque tiene todas las facilidades, ella siempre a querido mucho estudiar enfermería y lo a venido haciendo, ya termino el primer semestre gracias al instituto campo alto ella trabaja, donde trabaja le han dado la facilidad de estudiar y acabar los estudios y seguir en el instituto campo alto, le queda muy duro por que tiene que ayudarle a la tía para pagar arriendo y servicios donde viven, pues son muchas cosas que a  yuly paola le a tocado pasar para que ahora este estudiando enfermería. 
Ella dice que quiere seguir adelante con el estudio, quiere ser una profesional para poder ayudarle a la sociedad, le gusta mucho ayudarle a la gente y con las oportunidades que le puedan brindar sera mas fácil para ella terminar esta carrera.
El convenio kiva seria de gran ayuda ya que a ella le queda muy complicado realizar el pago completo de la mensualidad, pues como ella contó antes tiene que ayudar en la casa donde vive con la tia con varios gastos y e dinero es un poco escaso, ella agradecería la ayuda que le puedan dar.
texts.en:
Yuly Paola is 22 years old.  She currently lives in Bogota with her aunt Deisy, who is like her mother.  With six siblings, in total they are seven.  Her aunt has always been her mother and head of the household.  Yuly Paola has always made an effort to become someone in life.  Her aunt was able to send her to school through primary school, and since then she has paid for her studies herself, and she was able to finish.  Since she finished school, she has had many problems, because she had a daughter but the father took her with tricks and lies.  There was a process, and unjustly, he was given custody.  This was very hard for her until she made the decision to continue with her studies.  

It has been hard for her because there is a process in another city to get back her daughter Laura Valentina, who was taken from her unjustly.  Since she has started studying at Campo Alto, her life has totally changed.  Since she has all the abilities, she has always wanted to study nursing, and now she is doing it.  She has finished her first semester.  Thanks to Campo Alto, she works in the family house.  There she has been able to study and continue at Campo Alto.  It has been very hard for her since she has to help her aunt to pay rent and utilities.  Many things have happened to Yuly Paola to get her to study nursing now.  

She says that she wants to continue with her studies and become a professional to help society.  She likes to help people and with the opportunities that can be provided, it will be easier for her to finish her degree.  Kiva will be a great help to her since it is very complicated to make a full monthly payment, since she has to help with the household expenses and money is tight.  She is grateful for the help you can provide.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of school.

loans.name: David

texts.es:
David es  un joven que nació en Bogotá en 1978, es padre de dos hermosos niños, desde hace varios años, más es específicamente en el año 2000 en la escuela de enfermería campo alto se le veía muy dedicado al cuidado de los enfermos y el restablecimiento de la salud, le gusta  esa profesión por eso que a pesar de las dificultades tomo la decisión  de terminar los estudios en la misma academia llamada  Campo Alto, para así cumplir una de las metas y así cumplir con lo que  está encaminado, el poder ayudar al que lo necesite, el cuidado del paciente. 
Es por eso que el joven David  necesita el subsidio, ya que tiene responsabilidades con el hogar y necesita de la colaboración para así cumplir la meta y graduarse de enfermero.
texts.en:
David is a youthful man who was born in Bogota in 1978. He is the father of two beautiful children. Several years ago, more specifically in 2000 at the CampoAlto School of Nursing, he was very devoted to the care of the sick and the restoration of their health. He enjoyed this profession despite the difficulties he had in making the decision to finish his studies at an academy that is also named CampoAlto.

In order to accomplish one of his goals and to complete what he set out to do, David is requesting assistance to obtain what he needs so that he can care for patients. For this reason, David needs this loan. He already has responsibilities at home, so obtaining the assistance he needs will allow him to accomplish this goal and graduate as a nurse.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of tuition.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca se dedica a la venta frutas como por ejemplo manzanas, naranjas, uvas, plátanos y mandarinas. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mangos y piñas.La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota. 

Este préstamo es parte de las lineas de créditos "Credi Yapa" de la Asociación Arariwa, que permite los prestatarios con un buen historial de crediticio a recibir un especial préstamo: Credi Yapa es un pequeño préstamo, además de su préstamo regular, que tiene un calendario de pagos flexible.
texts.en:
Francisca makes a living selling fruits such as apples, oranges, grapes, bananas, and mandarins.  She needs this loan to buy mangos and pineapples.  She's happy about the loan and promises to make her payments punctually.

This loan is part of Asociación Arariwa's Credi Yapa line of credit, which allows borrowers with a good credit history to receive a special loan.  Credi Yapa is a small loan that has a flexible payment schedule as well as a regular loan.

loans.use: to buy mangos and pineapples

loans.name: Juana Maria

texts.es: La señora Juana, tiene 55 años de edad es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable, quedo viuda con tres hijos, de los cuales dos viven con ella y le colaboran en la actividad lechera; a través de los años ha construido y montado su granja en la zona mas tradicional de Cochabamba para la producción de leche,en esta actividad los forrajes son escasos en muchas épocas del año, como no cuenta con muchos recursos economicos, solicita un credito para la compra de cáscara de soya que forma parte de la alimentación de su ganado y es esencial para poder producir la leche con todas las propiedades para su entrega. Cuenta con buenas vacas pero se quedo sin capital para insumos porque construyo comederos y un tinglado para las vacas que se encontraban muy desprotejidas en épocas de mucho calor o lluvias muy fuertes como las de la presente época, que inunda esas zonas. De esta forma lograra aumentar sus ingresos y mejorar su nivel de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Juana is 55 years old. She is a very hard-working and responsible person. She is a widow with three children, of whom two live with her. They collaborate on dairy farming. Through the years, she has built and maintained her dairy farm in the most traditional part of Cochabamba. In this work, the fodder is lacking at many points in the year. As she cannot count on many financial resources, she requests this loan to buy soybean skin that makes up part of the feed for her livestock and is essential for her to produce the milk with all of her resources. She can count on good cows, but remains without capital for supplies because she built troughs and a shed for the cows, which are otherwise unprotected in very hot weather or in heavy rain, that inundates this area at this time. In this way, she will succeed in increasing her income and improving her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy soybean skin that makes up part of the feed for her livestock.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
Roberto nació y vive en la ciudad de Paucartambo. Esta ciudad se característica por tener paisajes hermosos y ser la ciudad folclórica del departamento del Cusco.  La mayoría de los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y crianza de animales. En el mes de julio se celebra la festividad de la virgen de Carmen y llegan de diferentes lugares del Peru para esta fiesta que se extiende por tres días. 
Roberto durante todo el año se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería pues tiene varios terrenos de cultivos y varios ganados como vacas, ovejas, gallinas y cuyes, él es uno de los fundadores del banco comunal “Nuevo Amanecer” y tiene varios años participando. En esta ciudad no existe entidad financieras permanentes como la Asociación Arariwa entonces él se prestó dinero desde hace varios años atrás entonces en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para compra semillas. 

Roberto está  agradecido por el apoyo brindado y se compromete a pagar con mucha responsabilidad y puntualidad las cuotas.
texts.en:
Roberto was born and lives in the city of  Paucartambo. This city is described as having beautiful landscapes and as being a traditional city of the department of Cuzco. Most of the residents work in agriculture, ranching and in raising animals. In July, the festival of the Virgin of Carmen is celebrated and people from different parts of Peru arrive for this festival that lasts for three days. 
 
Roberto works all year in agriculture and ranching. He has several plots of cropland and several cows, sheep, chickens and guinea pigs. He is one of the founders of the “Nuevo Amanecer” communal bank and he has been participating for several years. There are permanent financial institutions in this city such as the Asociación Arariwa so he did borrow money several years ago and at this time he needs the loan to buy seeds. 

Roberto is grateful for the support that is being given and committed to making his payments on time responsibly.

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase farming supplies (larvicide, fungicide, compost).

loans.name: Segundo Heriberto

texts.es:
Segundo de 42 años de edad de estado civil casado, desde hace más de 20 años, Segundo nació en la ciudad de Latacunga en la parroquia Eloy Alfaro  un barrio muy humilde, pero lleno de oportunidades, vive en casa propia. Desde muy pequeño ha sido muy trabajador por el mismo hecho que la situación económica de su hogar no era muy buena, salía a trabajar con sus padres, y con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio pudo terminar la primaria, desde ahí se dedicó a trabajar en una mecánica como maestro ayudante, ese fue el inicio para aprender lo que más le gustaba siguió algunos cursos para poder obtener como profesión mecánico, esta profesión es la que le ayudado a salir adelante durante mucho tiempo, para poder sustentar su hogar, y hoy su esposa se llena de orgullo al tener a su lado a Segundo una persona luchadora y muy responsable que trabaja muy duro todos los días para poder dar a María y a sus hijos todo lo que necesiten, María y Segundo tiene 5 bellos hijos los cuales juegan por toda la casa llenado a sus padres de alegría.
Segundo junto a su esposa se dedican a la elaboración de bloques en el barrio Guapulo el cual es muy reconocido por esta actividad económica, esta actividad la aprendió de sus padres quienes desde pequeño le enseñaron a realizar bloques, trabaja de 6 a 7 horas diarias con el apoyo de su esposa, lo más difícil de esta actividad considera es el esfuerzo que esto conlleva.
Segundo tiene un gran sueño y este es el ver a sus hijos crecer sanamente y que lleguen a ser unos grandes profesionales.
Es estos momentos Segundo necesita comprar unas cajas y más material para la elaboración de bloques y es por esta razón que está solicitando un crédito para que sus ventas sigan aumentando como en estos últimos meses, es por esta razón que Segundo solicita el crédito y agrade a Fundación Alternativa en Ecuador y a Kiva por hacer posible el crecimiento en su vida familiar y personal.
texts.en:
Segundo is 42 years old and has been married for over twenty years. Segundo was born in the city of Latacunga, in Eloy Alfaro parish, a neighborhood that is very humble but full of opportunities. He lives in his own home. Ever since he was very little he was always a very hard worker. Because of the fact that the financial situation at home wasn't very good, he would go out to work with his parents. He was able to finish primary school with lots of effort and sacrifice. From there he went to work in a car repair shop as a mechanic's helper, which is where he started to learn waht he liked the most. He completed some courses in order to become a professional mechanic, and this profession is what helped him get ahead for a long time, enabling him to provide for his family. Today his wife María is proud to have Segundo by her side because he is a fighter and a very responsible person who works hard every day in order to give her and their children everything they need. María and Segundo have five beautiful children that are always playing all over the house and fill their parents with joy.

Segundo and his wife work making bricks in the neighborhood of Guapulo, which is very well known for this business. He learned it from his parents, who taught him how to make bricks as a child. He works between six and seven hours per day with his wife's help. He believes the hardest part of this business is the effort it entails. 

Segundo's greatest dream is to see his children grow up healthy and become great professionals. 

Currently Segundo needs to buy some boxes and more materials for making bricks. That is why he is requesting a loan, so that his sales can keep increasing as they have been for the past months. That is why Segundo is requesting this loan and he is grateful to Fundación Alternativa in Ecuador and to Kiva for making growth possible in his family and personal life.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials.

loans.name: Diana Yubeth

texts.es:
Diana desde muy niña siempre tuvo un gran sueño estudiar enfermería, algo que a la corta edad todavía  no podría realizar, pero con el paso del tiempo él destino seria siempre quien reafirmarían que  esa sería la mejor carrera que ella podrá escoger, lo que hasta ese momento ella no tenía claro es que la enfermería más que una carrera es un  bonita vocación, con el paso del tiempo DIOS  le envió uno de los mayores  ejemplos y la más grande  inspiración, el hijo  Juan David  un angelito que poco a poco le enseñaría el sentido de la verdadera vida, a pesar de las dificultades y obstáculos que atraviesa por la salud de Juan David y hoy después de 11 años Diana  entiende  que DIOS siempre trazo el destino y que enfermería es la carrera que la apasiona y  el mejor paciente es el hijo, que con la sonrisa alegra todo el mundo, y  le hace entender una vez más que enfermería es el don de dar sin recibir nada a cambio.
Ya que Juan David nació con cerios problemas de salud, por lo cual Diana a luchado durante más de 11 años para buscar el bienestar del hijo que ahora ha logrado muchas metas con las terapias, por esa razón Diana nunca pierde las esperanza de  algún día terminar esta carrera como lo es enfermería, para lograr brindarle a   Juan David una mejor calidad de vida, para ella y para el hogar que tiene seria de gran ayuda el subsidio de kiva, ya que con el hijo los gastos se incrementan un poco mas y al pagar las cuotas le queda muy complicado para lo que ella paga y los gastos que el hogar genera, es por eso que ella desea tener el convenio con kiva para que pueda terminar con gran alegría la carrera a la cual ella le tiene mucho amor.
texts.en:
Since she was a girl, Diana always had the big dream of studying nursing, something she still couldn't do at her young age. But time would always reaffirm that this would be the best major she could choose. What she didn't understand until now is that nursing is more than a major, it is a nice vocation. Over time, GOD sent her one of the best examples and her biggest inspiration, her son Juan David. He is a little angel who little by little would teach her about the real meaning of life. Despite the difficulties and obstacles that she is going through because of Juan David's health, today, after 11 years, Diana understands that GOD had set her destiny and that nursing is her passion and that her best patient is her son. He makes everyone happy with his smile, and he makes her understand once again that nursing is the gift of giving while receiving nothing in return.   

Since Juan David was born with serious health problems, Diana has fought for 11 years for his well being, which she has achieved with a lot of therapies. That is why Diana never loses hope that one day she will finish her major in nursing to be able to offer Juan David a better quality of life for her and for her home. The Kiva subsidy would be a big help, since with her son the expenses are increasing a little more and when she makes the payments it is very complicated for her to pay for the household expenses. That is why she wants to have the contract with Kiva so that she can happily finish her major that she loves so much.

loans.use: to pay for a semester's tuition.

loans.name: Antonio Santos

texts.es: El Señor Antonio de 45 años, es originario del municipio de Villanueva, reside en la comunidad el bonete, caracterizado por ser un buen trabajador dedicado a su familia y a su trabajo, amante a la labor que realiza, ha sabido manejar su condición de vida, casado,  con 3 hijos, es transportista, cuenta con un negocio propio. Actualmente se presento a Ceprodel con el fin de solicitar un préstamo para  ajustar la compra de un micro bus.  Debido a la demanda que presenta la población  en trasportarse de la comunidad de Israel  al bonete,  de esta manera incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Señor Antonio is 45 years old, he is from the municipality of Villanueva, and he lives in the community of El Bonete. He is known for being a good worker who is dedicated to his family and his job; for loving the work that he does, and for having been able to improve his living conditions.

He is married with three children, and he has his own transportation business. 

He has come to CEPRODEL for the purpose of requesting a loan in order to purchase a microbus, because of the demand for public transportation from the community of Israel to El Bonete; and in this way he will increase his income and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a microbus.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
For the last two years Stephen, 31 years old, has been running a mobile phone repair and accessories business in Kapsabet. He earns a monthly income of Kshs. 51,000.
 
Stephen has requested a loan of Kshs 70,000 to purchase mobile phone parts and other accessories. With the anticipated profits he will repay the loan and expand his business. His dream is to expand his enterprise to the point where he is financially stable.

loans.use: To purchase mobile phone parts

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica is a 46-year-old sole proprietor of a local restaurant in Miritini, Kenya. She supports three siblings; her mother and spouse provide additional income. She has been in this business for the last 21 years and has done very well.

This will mark Monica's fourth loan from VisionFund Kenya to finance her business. She will use the money to purchase soft drinks and new plastic chairs; the anticipated profit will service her loan and improve her life. Monica hopes to own an expanded restaurant in the future.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks and new plastic chairs

loans.name: Julia Sandra

texts.es:
Una mirada fresca, más una sonrisa cautivadora, son los ingrediente perfectos que le ha otorgado a sus clientes, durante 26 años como comerciante ambulante de comida, la cocinera de Teustepe Julia Navarro. Con una carreta negra de hierro, más cuatro termos llenos de comida hecha en casa, los cuales reflejan mediante sus colores la alegría de esta mujer, son sus principales herramientas de trabajo.
Solicita el crédito para comprar: Arroz, Aceite, Azúcar, Leche, entre otros granos básicos.
Doña Julia ha obtenido resultados ejemplares, pues sin haber iniciado sus estudios secundarios, creó su negocio. A sus 52 años de edad, sabe que es una mujer autosuficiente, pero también sabe y desea seguir mejorando su calidad de vida. El color asimétrico de su piel morena, muestran su lucha diaria por seguir adelante, lucha que en un futuro le permitirá tener un negocio fijo, el cual podría generar empleo a personas q tengan su mismo deseo de superación.
texts.en:
A fresh look, plus a captivating smile are the perfect ingredients that Julia Navarro, the cook from Teustepe, has offered her customers during her 26 years as a food sales street vendor.  A black, iron cart, plus four coolers filled with homemade food, which reflect this woman’s happiness through their colors, are her main tools of the trade.

Julia has achieved exemplary results, since she has been able to grow her business without having started high school.  At her 52 years of age, she knows that she is a self-reliant woman, but also wishes to keep improving her quality of life.  The asymmetric color of her dark skin shows her daily struggle to get ahead, a struggle that will allow her to have a permanent business in the future and enable her to generate employment for people that have the same desire to succeed.  She is requesting the loan to purchase rice, oil, sugar, milk, and other basic grains.

loans.use: to purchase rice, oil, sugar, milk, and other basic grains.

loans.name: Hugo Armando

texts.es:
Hugo de 36 años de edad, es un hombre honrado y trabajador,  a pesar de solo haber estudiado quinto grado, ha podido sacar  adelante a su familia, aprendiendo oficios que le han permitido asegurar que  no falte el sustento diario en su hogar, está casado, su esposa ha sido un apoyo fundamental, ella es comerciante, tiene venta de platillos típicos todas las tardes cerca de su casa. Tienen 3 hijos de estos solo dos estudian y el tercero que es el mayor le ayuda a él en las actividades de albañilería.


Él trabaja en la albañilería desde hace 20 años, los cuales le han servido para ir mejorando su trabajo, este oficio lo aprendió trabajando como ayudante de albañil,  por varios años hasta que decidió entrar de lleno por su cuenta, en los trabajos le ayuda su hijo mayor a quien le está transmitiendo sus conocimientos en esta actividad.
Trabajan de lunes a sábado y si es necesario hasta el domingo.


El crédito lo utilizara en la compra de nuevas y mejores herramientas para desarrollar mejor su trabajo, esto es necesario para facilitar y agilizar las obras en las cuales trabajan. En este momento tienen la oportunidad de arrancar unos trabajos que les han asignado y es conveniente que puedan tener las herramientas en buen estado y óptimas.

Su sueño es que su hijo pueda aprender el oficio, transmitiéndose de generación en generación, él considera que este oficio tiene siempre gran demanda y es un trabajo honrado, al manejar la técnica hasta se disfruta desarrollarlo.
texts.en:
Hugo is 36 years old. He is an honest and hardworking man. Even though he was only able to study up to the fifth grade he has been able to get his family ahead by learning a trade that has allowed him to ensure that his home is not lacking daily sustenance. He is married. His wife has provided him with fundamental support. She is a merchant who sells traditional meals every afternoon near their home. They have three children, two of which are in school and the third who is the oldest helps Hugo with his masonry work. 

Hugo has worked as a mason for 20 years which has allowed him to continuously improve his business. He learned this trade as a mason's assistant for several years until he decided to head out on his own. He is transmitting his knowledge of this trade to his eldest son who helps him with his jobs. He works from Monday to Saturday and on Sundays when it is necessary.


Hugo will use this loan to purchase new and better tools to improve his business. This is necessary to facilitate and streamline the jobs that they are working on. At this moment they have the opportunity to start some jobs that they have arranged and it is advisable that they have their tools in optimal condition and good order.

Hugo's dream is that his son will be able to learn this trade and it will be transmitted from generation to generation. He believes that this trade will always be in high demand and that it is honorable work to learn this technique until one enjoys developing it.

loans.use: to purchase new and better tools to better develop his masonry business.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan, a 38-year-old married mother of four from Embu, has a business as a mixed-crop farmer. She is married to Ndwiga, and their children are ages 20, 17, 16 and 13 years. She has been in the farming business for the past nine years. She earns a monthly income of KES 20,000, which she uses to support her family. 

This marks her third loan term with VisionFund Kenya after repaying her previous loans successfully. With the loan she has applied for from VisionFund Kenya, she will be able to purchase farm inputs. The additional income created will allow her to improve her family's standard of living and to use the remaining amount for the education of her children. In the future, Susan would like to expand her farming land. 

She hopes to become a prominent farmer and be able to provide sustainable food for her family.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs

loans.name: Jay Maa Mangala Shg (A) Group

texts.en:
Jay Maa Mangala Self-Help Group was formed with seven members in 2010 in a small village in Odisha. They all came together to help each other and solve the social issues among them, save money and provide financial support to their families. They chose Laxmi as the leader of their group. The lady standing with her raised hand is Laxmi.

Laxmi is a 26-year-old woman living with her husband and her three children. For four years, Laxmi’s husband has been working as a farmer to support his small family. His income is not sufficient to support the family. So, Laxmi is helping her husband by working with him and being involved in the mushroom cultivating business. She has four years of experience in this business. 

She has requested a loan to buy more mushroom seeds, straw, and other raw materials, and to repair her space where the mushrooms are cultivated, so that she can add to her family’s income. Laxmi says that by selling mushrooms, she can support her family, and she can send her child to a good school; through that, she can provide a better education to her children. 

The other members of the group are involved in fish selling, agriculture, and retail stores.

loans.use: to purchase mushroom seeds, straw and other raw material, and to repair her space where the mushrooms are cultivated.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy vegetables for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his study.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is now 49 years old and supports four school-going children.  She still runs her dairy farming business in Kapsabet town and is served by VisionFund Kenya, Kapsabet Branch.

After her first loan, her business income improved from an average monthly profit of KES 30,000 to KES 43,000.

She has taken a loan of KES 100,000, of which she will use KES 60,000 to pay school fees for her children and the remaining amount to purchase feed for her dairy cows.

With the anticipated profits, she will pay her children's school fees and make the loan repayment, as well as expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase animal feed and drugs for her cows.

loans.name: Narciso

texts.es: Narciso tiene 58 años de edad y tiene aproximadamente 11 años de trabajar como agente de seguridad en una empresa cercana a su localidad. De esta forma se gana la vida y mantiene la economía del hogar. Narciso  desea terminar de construir un muro de retención antes de que el invierno llegue dado que su terrenos se lava y desea protegerlo ya que es su único patrimonio. Narciso solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así proceder a la construcción lo antes posible.
